title: INVALIDATE_IDLE_CAM
content:
0xF4F2C0D4EE209E200xD75CDD75// InvalidateIdleCam
void INVALIDATE_IDLE_CAM();Resets the idle camera timer. Calling that in a loop once every few seconds is enough to disable the idle cinematic camera.Examples:LuaCitizen.CreateThread(function()
	while true do
		InvalidateIdleCam()
		InvalidateVehicleIdleCam()
		Wait(1000) --The idle camera activates after 30 second so we don't need to call this per frame
	end
end)
